author: proofofjk
content: Hey, are there people interested in launching a new testnet? I saw that it's expected for Medalla to start reaching finality from November 3rd, but it's been just a huge setback for us to wait to test some of our products.

author: jgm
content: Launching a new testnet isn't hard, but probably not worth doing until the 1.0 spec is in place as it'll just be abandoned and we'll have another bit-net to have to look after

author: proofofjk
content: Any ETA on when the 1.0 spec would be in place?

author: jgm
content: Hard to tell.  There is this https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/milestone/5 linked from https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/projects/1#column-10551129 but there has been very little movement on it in the past month

author: proofofjk
content: We might be getting our own private one going. We want to get real people testing out our platform, but without Medalla going, can't really put it to the test ðŸ˜¦

author: jgm
content: If you're after them joining you with their own beacon nodes things are a fair bit more difficult (you'll need a custom config).  If it's just showing off a UI with you having complete control of the beacon nodes you could fire up a testnet.
